comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to books.google.com/books?id=AbZLAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA217&l... a Fitzhugh W. Haensel was part of Haensel & Jones, a company that managed "artists in concert, oratorio and recital." Mrs. F.W. Haensel ( in another Bain picture) was Florence Owen A Heber McDonald is mentioned in NYT of Dec 5 ,1926 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00A15F73C5F147A... as an offical at WAHG, a radio station that broadcast concerts.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/ggbain.32711/ is the photo with Mrs. Haensel in, a Bain photo not yet up on Flickr.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Photo of Fitzhugh W. Haensel at books.google.com/books?id=vStEAQAAIAAJ&pg=PA25&lp... Looks like the same guy.
